Pace.description: Determines the speed of your strategy, from slow and deliberate to fast and aggressive.

Risk.description: Reflects your comfort with high-risk, high-reward plays versus safe and consistent ones.

Interact.description: Measures how much you engage with your opponents' game plans, either proactively or reactively.

Resource.description: Indicates your focus on mana efficiency and card advantage.

Presence.description: Describes the visibility and impact of your threats on the board.

Social.description: Shows how much you rely on diplomacy and table politics.
